title.rendered: This Prototype Tesla Charger is Pretty Damn Creepy

content.rendered: If you own a Tesla Model S you can possibly one day own this handy automated charger that’ll live in your garage and seek out your car’s charging port all on its own. The feature sounds pretty amazing but if you sit around to actually watch it work it might freak you out.

title.rendered: Learn How to Drive a Ferrari With This Insanely Cute Girl

content.rendered: Ever dream of getting behind the wheel of a Ferrari but terrified that you might not know how to even get the thing started! Well, worry no further. This beauty is learning how to drive that beauty and she’s helping you out by asking all the questions that you might be too embarrassed to ask!

title.rendered: Lexus Made Working Hoverboard

content.rendered:
Remember in Back to the Future when Marty McFly has to grab a young girl’s hoverboard to escape from Biff’s gang? Well that “future” scene was supposed to be the year 2015. Now here we are in 2015 and Lexus has stepped up to the plate and created a real, honest to God hoverboard!

They’ve been teasing this beauty all month long and they’re finally unveiling it here! \

Check out this video showing an actual hoverboard in action!

title.rendered: Poor Mustang Driver’s Day Couldn’t Get Any Worse

content.rendered: This police dash cam shows a poor Mustang driver who gets pulled over for speeding. That alone is a bummer. While he’s waiting for the officer to finish writing the ticket, he notices someone driving erratically and gets out of the way as a truck barrels into the side of him. It swipes his Mustang and nudges it off the road. Luckily, as the cop points out, he had the whole thing on camera.

title.rendered: We Definitely Want One of These Diesel Powered Firewood Processors

content.rendered:
We love seeing serious strength and horsepower applied to everything, even when they aren’t cars!

Check out this incredible log cutting then splitting fire wood producing machine! It’s powered by a 453 Detroit 4 cylinder that can put out 105 HP! We’re not certain who made this or where it is but we’d all love to have one of our own for the winter time!

title.rendered: Forget the Parking Brake on a Boat Ramp and This’ll Happen!

content.rendered: The truck being towed out of the lake is only a few days old. Sadly, this truck belonged to a man who let his wife park it on a boat ramp.  She forgot the parking brake and the car rolled right into the lake!

excerpt.rendered: The truck being towed out of the lake is only a few days old. Sadly, this truck belonged to a man who let his wife park it on a boat ramp.  She forgot the parking brake and the car rolled right into the lake!

title.rendered: Using a Bugatti Veyron to Weed Out the Gold Diggers

content.rendered:
Ever wonder how easy it must be to pick up women with a super car at your side? Owning one lets everyone around you know you’ve obviously got some money and lets face it: a lot of women tend to go for money.

These guys decided to borrow a friend’s Bugatti Veyron and film one of them trying to ask some women to get a bite to eat. All the women appear interested but only as long as the car actually belongs to the guy asking them out. After they agree to go out to eat with him he shows them his real ride (a typical white sedan) and they suddenly all come up with some sort of excuse – proving that many of these women are only interested in someone with swole pockets. Except for the honest woman at the end!

title.rendered: This Crane Tragedy is One of the Scariest Things You’ll See All Day

content.rendered: Over in the Netherlands, a crew was working on constructing a bridge when this horrible accident occurred. The crew was using a barge and two enormous cranes to help lift and place a large section of bridge when the weight to counter weight ratio must have been mistaken. The cranes wind up collapsing after listing the barge entirely too heavily. Early reports don’t indicate any deaths as a result but there are at least 20 injured.

title.rendered: The Weirdest Bridge in the World is Over 100 Years Old

content.rendered: This is the Newport Transporter Bridge. It’s a local attraction in Wales where it was built over 100 years ago. It’s a unique and strange type of bridge that’s no longer constructed these days. However, 100 years ago when Wales needed a bridge over this river they couldn’t construct a typical bridge of the time because of the space required to make something big enough for large ships to pass under. They also couldn’t create a typical ferry since the water depth changes so dramatically up and down all day long!

title.rendered: This is what a Nissan Stuffed in a Ball Rolling Down a Hill Looks Like

content.rendered:
You’ve probably seen these Zorbs around or at least in videos about people rolling down hills. They’re enormous inflatable balls that people can use for various games or activities. Nissan has taken this giant Zorb and stuff a car inside to help show off the strengths of its design. Aside from showing off something like the car’s crumple zones upon impact we can’t figure out what the point of this stunt is.

However, we won’t deny that it would have been a lot of fun to watch the Zorb pop and the car to tumble down the hill on its own!

title.rendered: Dodge Cummins Gloats Too Much After This Tug of War Win

content.rendered:
A coal rolling Dodge, likely packing a Cummins under the hood, completely dominated this tug of war against this Chevy. Now tug of war contests are always great fun and while the victor certainly gets to enjoy some bragging rights one has to be good sport about it!

This Dodge is NOT a good sport. Not only does he dominate the Chevy but he then proceeds to drag the Chevy around the parking lot like a fresh kill! It’s brutally embarrassing for the Chevy and right before the video ends it looks like a fight even breaks out!

title.rendered: It’s a Surfing Motorbike!

content.rendered:
After two years of work, Pro FMX rider Robbie Maddison has made his dream come true with a surfing motorbike.

The secret appears to be a combination of a ski-sled pad below the wheels and wide tires with an incredibly heavy tread.

You’ll have to see it to believe it.

While the guys try to find a way to pull the sunken Jeep from the mud, the girls go for a dip.

title.rendered: World’s Most Patient Sheriff Arrests the World’s Most Self-Righteous Young Woman

content.rendered:
This sheriff must be the world’s most patient law enforcement officer when dealing with this hysterical young woman.

Just when you think her arguments can’t get any more ludicrous, something even more insane comes out of her mouth.

When the handcuffs go on and she starts screaming “This is rape! You’re raping me!” you’ll truly understand the type of crap these officers have to put up with on a daily basis.

title.rendered: The Car Park of the Future?

content.rendered: Ever wanted to cover your vehicle and protect it from the elements but still show it off to the neighbors? Say hello to the GazeBox. This retractable cover gets bolted down into your drive way and can fold over ride in just a moment’s time.

title.rendered: The Best Rage Fail You’ll See All Day!

content.rendered:
A cyclist over in England was wearing a few cameras when a car passed him too closely. He proceeded to chase down the driver to tell him (rather politely at first) that he should be more careful. The driver of the vehicle wasn’t having any of it. He starts cursing and screaming at the cyclist. The guy in the car gets to into his road rage that he loses his ability to speak actual insults and curses!

When the cyclist starts the leave the man gets out to chase him down. He tries to kick the cyclist but winds up tripping and falling end over end! We could watch this guy lose his call and take a tumble all day long!

title.rendered: This Guy Standing on the Side of the Road Never Saw that Tire Headed His Way

content.rendered:
This poor fool on the side of the road stopped to maybe fix something going on with his car or, from the looks of it, pee off a bridge.

Whatever the reason, he had no idea to expect that a tire might come flying off a passing truck and roll so perfectly down the side of the road that it not only hits him dead on but winds up tossing him off the bridge itself!

title.rendered: The Amazing Spider Car

content.rendered:
Check out the amazing spider car! This crazy electric kart is the ultimate all terrain vehicle! It can cover practically any change in the ground beneath it as its wheels can extend, stretch and shift to any height differential!

We’d definitely love one of these to drive around in the back country!

category.description: Trucks, Jeeps, Buggys, and events that happen off the tarmac or asphalt all gather here in our home for down and dirty off road goodness!

category.name: Tech
category.description: It's the new millennium and technology is everywhere, even inside our cars. If you're a techie and love reading about the latest car gadgets or alternative fuels, we've got what you need in this little corner.

title.rendered: This is What a Near Death Experience Looks Like

content.rendered:
Crazy things happens on the roads in Russia constantly! That’s why people nearly all drivers in Russia have a dash cam to make sure they’ve got evidence of everything going on around them for their own protection!

This couple was driving along when a jackknifed trailer took over the entire highway and nearly crushed them. Luckily they made sure to have their camera running so we could get a glimpse as to how terrifying it is to almost have such a huge truck crush you in your own car!

category.name: Grab Bag
category.description: Random, sometimes shocking, and usually for the lulz

title.rendered: Why Would This Person Drive Their Audi Q7 Into a Flooded River?!

content.rendered:
Audi Q7s aren’t cheap cars. If you own one you might think it can handle a lot of what the road can throw at you. It may very well be able to. However, as this owner in Europe found out they can’t really tackle a flooded highway.

It’s like they just drive straight in without a second thought!

title.rendered: The Best Supercar Crashes of the Last 5 Years

content.rendered:
TurboNation has combed the internet and put together a great compilation of some of the most gruesome and horrific wrecks and crashes spanning from 2010 to 2015.

Well, to be fair their only gruesome and horrific in the sense that they all involve beautiful supercars along the likes of Ferrari and Bugatti.

title.rendered: Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee – In and Out

content.rendered: These are great outtakes of the Jerry Seinfeld’s series, “Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee.” You see Jerry’s guests getting in and out of a fleet of classic cars.  Watching them wedge themselves into the cars and searching for the hidden doorhandles proves hilarious! The angles may not be flattering but they are damn funny.

excerpt.rendered: These are great outtakes of the Jerry Seinfeld’s series, “Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee.” You see Jerry’s guests getting in and out of a fleet of classic cars.  Watching them wedge themselves into the cars and searching for the hidden doorhandles proves hilarious! The angles may not be flattering but they are damn funny.

title.rendered: Car Gets Launched Into Air From Median and Obliterates When It Hits the Overpass!

content.rendered:
This footage from a couple of years back is absolutely amazing! It shows a car run off the road for whatever reason. He’s screaming down the grassy median when he hits a ramp and gets sent flying into the air. Once he’s airborne he hits the overpass dead on and the car gets demolished into small pieces that rain down all over the highway.

What’s really crazy about this? The driver survived!
